General.Name: Pacific Orient Bhd
General.Description: Pacific & Orient Berhad, an investment holding company, provides financial and information technology services. The company operates through five segments: Insurance, Information Technology, Investment Holding, Money Lending, and Investment in Start-Ups. It offers general insurance and money lending services; sells information technology equipment; distributes consumer goods; invests in real estate and start-up companies; and deals in computer hardware, software, and systems. The company engages in the research and development, trading, and property development activities; and deals in properties and investments. It operates in Malaysia, Thailand, and the United States. Pacific & Orient Berhad was founded in 1994 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
